name: Life and Debt: A Real Life Simulator (itch)
name_original: Life and Debt: A Real Life Simulator (itch)
description:
Life & Debt: A Real Life Simulator is a 2D pixel art life management simulator. After moving out of your parents' house, you focus on the beginnings of new home ownership. You will have to maintain your finances and cashflow while having a really bad shopping addiction. Will you be able to furnish your house with everything or will you end up hoarding clocks or waterbottles?

  • Over 30 items to collect and horde.
  • Over 60+ different jobs!
  • Over 80+ Life Events that randomize the gameplay and force you to re-strategize
  • Multiple difficulties!
  • Localized into English, Spanish, German, Italian, French, Danish, Dutch, Russian and Klingon!
  • An Original Soundtrack composed by Christoph Gray, the composer behind  Chronicle: Unit Eight and stopDrop!
Purchasing on itch.io also grants you a Steam key to be able to earn achievements!
